DOC.HEADLINE: BANK WORKERS ARRESTED IN IRAN OVER FORGED ACCOUNTS
DOC.TEXT: Police have arrested a group of Iranian bank employees suspected of siphoning_off $ 3.6 million from government accounts , police said . Gen . Reza Seifollahi , in remarks published in Kayhan newspaper Tuesday , said all_the money was recovered from the group , which forged accounts in the state-owned Melli Bank .
